ing.item: Golden delicious apples (about 3 lb), peeled, cored and chopped, about 10 Cups
Sliced peaches (15-16 oz ea.) drained, sliced, in extra light syrup, cut in thirds
Jars whole onions (15 oz ea.), drained

directions.step:
1.Bring all ingredients to a boil in a large pot. Boil gently, uncovered, about 1 hour stirring occasionally, until thickened.
2. Cool slightly (mixture will continue to thicken as it cools). Pour into jars, cook, cover and refrigerate.
Makes 7 cups. Age for 3 days. Refrigerate up to 2 months.
